messages.subject: sorry I missed input on Kantei #1 Jim
messages.msgSnippet: I couldn t log on to Yahoo, so I had to be content to watch from the sidelines.  Of course I wasn t bright enought to just email you either. :-) My first
messages.messageBody:
I couldn't log on to Yahoo, so I had to be content to watch from the
sidelines. Of course I wasn't bright enought to just email you
either. :-)

My first instinct would be Yagyu, bold and robust looking with refined
iron and utilitarian in appearance. But the hitsu frames look a bit
delicate for typified Yagyu to me.

I'd bid Owari.
